suite.name: VG_del_Mathilda_Grund

test.name: Book safari on a past date

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Given I am logged in as Mathilda
I am on the register page
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Navigates to the specified page using the link id, saves the page name as a variable for later use by steps in the same test. Uses nested variables prefixed with the page name.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And I enter a valid password
Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Submit Form
kw.doc: Submits a form identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And I should be redirected to the login page
kw.source_name: I should be redirected to the ${page_name} page

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.
Used to assert that a redirect have been made and updates the page variable initially set in the "I am on the page_name page" keyword

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And I enter a valid password
Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Submit Form
kw.doc: Submits a form identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And I should be logged in
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: And I have a VIP Adult ticket in my cart
kw.source_name: I have a ${ticket_category} ${ticket_type} ticket in my cart

kw.name: I navigate to the tickets page
I am on the ${page_name} page
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Navigates to the specified page using the link id, saves the page name as a variable for later use by steps in the same test. Uses nested variables prefixed with the page name.

kw.name: I add a ${ticket_category} ${ticket_type} ticket to my cart
kw.source_name: I add a ${ticket_category} ${ticket_type} ticket to my cart

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id:ticket-category' by value VIP.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id:ticket-type' by value Adult.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Handle Alert
kw.doc: Handles the current alert and returns its message.
Adds desired ticket type to cart, utilizing the standard ticket quantity of 1

kw.name: And I am on the safari page
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Navigates to the specified page using the link id, saves the page name as a variable for later use by steps in the same test. Uses nested variables prefixed with the page name.

kw.name: When I add the Herbivore Tour on a past date to my cart
kw.source_name: I add the ${safari_type} on a past date to my cart

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id:safari-type' by value Herbivore Tour.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Submit Form
kw.doc: Submits a form identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should see a book safari on a past date error message
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id:safari-message' contains exact text 'You cannot book a safari for a date in the past.'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Test to make sure a user can't book a safari on a past date.

suite.doc: Testsvit för VG-delen Mathilda Grund Acceptanskiriterier: Användare ska kunna registrera ett unikt användarnamn på hemsidan: Testfall 1, 2, 3 En användare med Regular biljett ska inte kunna boka en safari på en helg. Testfall: 4 Och man ska inte kunna boka en safari för ett datum som redan passerat. Testfall: 5
